name: library
description: Library package template for distribution to npm

files.template:
{
  "name": "{{name}}",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "{{description}}",
  "main": "./dist/index.js",
  "module": "./dist/index.esm.js",
  "types": "./dist/index.d.ts",
  "exports": {
    ".": {
      "import": "./dist/index.esm.js",
      "require": "./dist/index.js",
      "types": "./dist/index.d.ts"
    }
  },
  "files": [
    "dist",
    "README.md",
    "LICENSE"
  ],
  "scripts": {
    "build": "bun run build:cjs && bun run build:esm",
    "build:cjs": "tsc --project tsconfig.cjs.json",
    "build:esm": "tsc --project tsconfig.esm.json",
    "build:types": "tsc --project tsconfig.types.json",
    "build:all": "bun run build:types && bun run build:cjs && bun run build:esm",
    "typecheck": "tsc --noEmit",
    "dev": "tsc --project tsconfig.types.json --watch",
    "test": "bun test",
    "test:unit": "bun test tests/unit/",
    "test:integration": "bun test tests/integration/",
    "test:coverage": "bun test --coverage",
    "test:watch": "bun test --watch",
    "lint": "eslint \"src/**/*.ts\" \"tests/**/*.ts\"",
    "lint:fix": "eslint \"src/**/*.ts\" \"tests/**/*.ts\" --fix",
    "format": "prettier --write \"src/**/*.ts\" \"tests/**/*.ts\"",
    "format:check": "prettier --check \"src/**/*.ts\" \"tests/**/*.ts\"",
    "prepublishOnly": "bun run build:all && bun run test",
    "prepack": "bun run build:all",
    "clean": "rm -rf dist node_modules coverage"
  },
  "dependencies": {},
  "devDependencies": {
    "@types/node": "^24.8.0",
    "typescript": "^5.3.3",
    "bun": "latest",
    "eslint": "^8.56.0",
    "prettier": "^3.1.0",
    "@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin": "^6.21.0",
    "@typescript-eslint/parser": "^6.21.0"
  },
  "peerDependencies": {
    "typescript": ">=4.5.0"
  },
  "engines": {
    "bun": ">=1.3.0",
    "node": ">=16.0.0"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "typescript",
    "library",
    "{{helper:kebabCase name}}"
  ],
  "author": "{{author}}",
  "license": "{{license}}",
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "https://github.com/username/{{name}}.git"
  },
  "bugs": {
    "url": "https://github.com/username/{{name}}/issues"
  },
  "homepage": "https://github.com/username/{{name}}#readme"
}

{
  "extends": "./tsconfig.base.json",
  "compilerOptions": {
    "outDir": "./dist",
    "rootDir": "./src",
    "declaration": true,
    "declarationMap": true,
    "sourceMap": true,
    "removeComments": false,
    "noImplicitAny": {{#if (eq qualityLevel 'strict')}}true{{else}}false{{/if}},
    "noImplicitReturns": {{#if (eq qualityLevel 'medium')}}true{{else}}{{#if (eq qualityLevel 'strict')}}true{{else}}false{{/if}}{{/if}},
    "noImplicitThis": {{#if (eq qualityLevel 'strict')}}true{{else}}false{{/if}},
    "noUnusedLocals": {{#if (eq qualityLevel 'strict')}}true{{else}}false{{/if}},
    "noUnusedParameters": {{#if (eq qualityLevel 'strict')}}true{{else}}false{{/if}},
    "exactOptionalPropertyTypes": {{#if (eq qualityLevel 'strict')}}true{{else}}false{{/if}}
  },
  "include": [
    "src/**/*"
  ],
  "exclude": [
    "node_modules",
    "dist",
    "coverage",
    "tests"
  ]
}

{
  "compilerOptions": {
    "target": "ES2020",
    "lib": ["ES2020"],
    "module": "ESNext",
    "moduleResolution": "node",
    "allowSyntheticDefaultImports": true,
    "esModuleInterop": true,
    "allowJs": true,
    "strict": true,
    "skipLibCheck": true,
    "forceConsistentCasingInFileNames": true,
    "resolveJsonModule": true
  }
}

## Build Output

This library builds to multiple formats:

- **CommonJS**: `dist/index.js`
- **ES Modules**: `dist/index.esm.js`
- **TypeScript Declarations**: `dist/index.d.ts`
